title: This Is How I Am Everyday
description:
Ryan Whitney of Spittin' Chiclets joins. Whitney comes in extremely hot with his fury sent in one direction. The guys discuss Chris Klemmer and Blind Mike, Whitney's hatred of Covid talk & much more. Before Whitney arrived, Kirk discusses the KFC & Mike drama as well as why he is a little down on Mike lately. We know the identity of the Red 13 employee, Dave Chappelle is attacked at his show & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
